abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Japan Social
            Development Fund (JSDF) Grant Access to Opportunities for
            Young People Project is to enhance the access of young men
            and women, between the ages of 14 to 26 years old, to
            opportunities for education, work and political
            participation. The changes intend to transfer resources from
            category (5) sub-grants for subprojects to categories: (1)
            consultants' services, (2) training or workshops and
            (4) operating costs. It is important to mention that the
            proposed changes will not alter the objective, components,
            activities, or deliverables of the project; neither will
            they imply a change to the project's safeguards.
